attributes.action: Deport serious offenders to their country of birth, regardless of their rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The grieving widow of Philip Lawrence, and general public, deserve and expect the deportation of such criminals as Learco Chindamo. Human rights are one thing, but sympathy and respect for the family of Mr. Lawrence are paramount to a civilised society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
